mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.title as title, a.contents as contents, a.hit as hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.g_no as gNo, a.o_no as oNo, a.depth as depth, a.user_id as userId, b.name as name from board a join user b on a.user_id = b.id order by gNo desc, oNo asc limit #{offset1}, #{offset2}
select id, title, contents, user_id as userId, g_no as gNo, o_no as oNO, depth from board where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents} where id = #{id}
update board set hit = hit+1 where id = #{id}
